headline.main: For Colombian Drug Mules, Trip to China Can Be Deadly
headline.print_headline: For Colombian Drug Mules, Trip to China Can Be Deadly

lead_paragraph: In a tiny brick apartment above a lottery shop, Martha Antivar waits for a sign of life from her husband, who is languishing in a Chinese prison an ocean away.
snippet: In a tiny brick apartment above a lottery shop, Martha Antivar waits for a sign of life from her husband, who is languishing in a Chinese prison an ocean away....
